Package casino

Class Round

java.lang.Object
casino.Round
public class Round extends Object
Class that simulates the basic commands every round of Poker would have
Author:
Eduardo Barata 99930, Andr√© Roque 86694

  • Constructor Details

    • Round

      public Round(Player p, int b, GameVariant d)
      Round construct, it also debits the player the amount bet
      Parameters:
      p - Player playing the round
      b - amount better
      d - Variant being played

  • Method Details

    • receiveCards

      public void receiveCards(Deck deck)
      Assigns the first 5 cards of the Deck to the player
      Parameters:
      deck - Deck being used in the game

    • replaceCards

      public void replaceCards(int[] replacepos, Deck thisdeck)
      Receives an array with the positions of the cards that should be replaced and replace them in the players hand
      Parameters:
      replacepos - Array with 0's in the positions to be replaced and 1's in the positions to be kept
      thisdeck - Deck from which we should draw the cards

    • advice

      public int[] advice()
      Return a vector with the positions that should be kept and discarded by the player in order to follow the perfect strategy dictated by the game variant
      Returns:
      Vector with the position to be kept and discarded

    • rewardPlayer

      public String rewardPlayer()
      Evaluate hand and reward the player accordingly to its hand value. It will also mark the end of the round, clearing the player's hand and return if the player won and with which hand or if he lost
      Returns:
      String with the winning hand and winning message or with losing message

    • getstats

      public int getstats()
      Gets the statistics for the whole game, placing them in a printable String and printing it
      Returns:
      Total amount of Hands evaluated

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main function with the only propose being for test usage
